subject: College Athletics
Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
lead_paragraph: In a federal appeals court, the N.C.A.A. said a judge’s decision in August that it had violated antitrust law by prohibiting athletes from profiting from their names and images was misguided.
snippet: In a federal appeals court, the N.C.A.A. said a judge’s decision in August that it had violated antitrust law by prohibiting athletes from profiting from their names and images was misguided.
